Tesla Shareholder Urges Board to Name an Independent Chairman $TSLA https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-04-26/tesla-shareholder-urges-board-to-name-an-independent-chairman

links.title: Tesla Shareholder Urges Board to Name an Independent Chairman
links.description: Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in June on whether to adopt a policy that the company only allow an independent director to be chairman, a role that Elon Musk has held since 2004. The proposal, submitted by Jing Zhao of Concord, California, argues Tesla shouldn't be an exception to what the individual shareholder called the "prevailing practice" in markets including the U.K.

links.title: Short-seller Jim Chanos reveals bets against Dunkin' Brands and Burger King's parent - the stocks sink
links.description: Short-seller Jim Chanos revealed Thursday on CNBC that he's betting against two fast food stocks. The founder and president of Kynikos Associates said in a "Squawk Box" interview that he's shorting Dunkin' Brands and Burger King's parent Restaurant Brands International. "We've been short these things for about a year," Chanos said.

links.title: Short-seller Jim Chanos says Elon Musk 'may be misleading investors'
links.description: Short-seller Jim Chanos is blasting Elon Musk's leadership at Tesla. Musk "may be misleading investors," he said Thursday on CNBC's " Squawk Box." "I think Elon Musk has crossed the Rubicon in terms of making statements to investors that he might rue later."

links.title: Here's the Biggest Mistake Short Sellers Are Making on Tesla
links.description: News hit early Thursday morning that the head of Tesla Inc.'s ( TSLA) Autopilot hardware program is leaving the company for Intel Corp. ( INTC) . It's another setback for Tesla - and a bunch of people are no doubt celebrating. That's because Tesla is bar none the most hated stock on Wall Street.
